abstract: Kurdish militants explode car bomb outside military checkpoint in southeastern Turkey, killing 10 soldiers and eight civilians; Turkey launches military attack against rebels in response.

headline.print_headline: Car Bomb Kills 18 at a Military Checkpoint in Turkey
headline.main: Car Bomb Kills 18 at a Military Checkpoint in Turkey

snippet: Ten soldiers and eight civilians died in an attack near the Iraq and Iran borders, Prime Minister Binali Yildirim said. The military blamed Kurdish militants....
lead_paragraph: Ten soldiers and eight civilians died in an attack near the Iraq and Iran borders, Prime Minister Binali Yildirim said. The military blamed Kurdish militants.
